$eref.description: Describes node configuration, some of which is specific to AWS (e.g. [instance types](https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/instance-types/)).
$eref.title: AWS Node Configuration

___name.description: Name of node for use by k2.

___mounts.description: Additional mounts made in the node.

___taints.description: List of AWS taints to associate with the kubernetes node

$eref.description: Describes node configuration, some of which is specific to GKE (e.g. [machine types](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/machine-types).
$eref.title: GKE Node Configuration

___name.description: Name of node for use by k2.

___taints.description: List of GKE taints to associate with the kubernetes node

description: Describes the configuration of a node within a nodePool.
title: Node Configuration
